hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Aishah, the mother of the Believers, that the Prophet used to come to her when he was fasting and say:"Do you have anything this morning that you can give me to eat?" we would say no, and he would say: "I am fasting." Then after that he came and she said: "I have been given a gift." He said: "What is it?" she said: "Hais." He said: "I started the day fasting," but then he ate

chapter.ara-name: باب النِّيَّةِ فِي الصِّيَامِ وَالاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى طَلْحَةَ بْنِ يَحْيَى بْنِ طَلْحَةَ فِي خَبَرِ عَائِشَةَ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: The intention to fast, and the differences reported from Talhah bin Yahya in the narration of 'Aishah about it
